source.name: EVM Compatibility Benefits
source.instructions: Which of the following are benefits of EVM (Ethereum Virtual Machine) compatibility in blockchain networks? Select all that apply.

answers.answer: Allows developers to use existing Ethereum tools and languages
Enables running smart contracts designed for Ethereum
Provides faster transaction speeds than Ethereum
Facilitates easier integration with Ethereum-based dApps
Guarantees lower gas fees than Ethereum

source.guidance:
The correct answers are:
1. Allows developers to use existing Ethereum tools and languages
2. Enables running smart contracts designed for Ethereum
3. Facilitates easier integration with Ethereum-based dApps

These options accurately reflect the benefits of EVM compatibility as described in the topic. EVM compatibility allows developers to leverage their existing knowledge and tools from Ethereum, run Ethereum-designed smart contracts, and easily integrate with Ethereum-based decentralized applications.

The incorrect options are:
1. Provides faster transaction speeds than Ethereum - EVM compatibility doesn't necessarily mean faster speeds; this depends on the specific blockchain's architecture.
2. Guarantees lower gas fees than Ethereum - While some EVM-compatible chains may have lower fees, this isn't a guaranteed feature of EVM compatibility itself.
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT identify the key benefits of EVM compatibility in blockchain networks
